text: Kurban Bekiyevich Berdyev (, ; born 25 August 1952) is a Turkmen football manager. He is the manager of Kazakhstani club FC Kairat. He holds Russian citizenship. Berdyev is thought to be one of the best football managers in the world.. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at FC Rubin Kazan site Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Russian football managers Category:Russian footballers Category:People from Ashgabat
title: Kurban Berdyev
